data.title: Cole Guy - 2013-14 - Men's Tennis
data.meta_description: Cole Guy - FRESHMAN (2014)Posted a 6-9 singles record as a rookie, with a 1-4 Southland Conference mark... Earned his first collegiate win, 6-2, 6-2, over Carlos
data.text:
FRESHMAN (2014)

Posted a 6-9 singles record as a rookie, with a 1-4 Southland Conference mark... Earned his first collegiate win, 6-2, 6-2, over Carlos McIntyre of Prairie View A&M... Won five of his six matches from March 14-April 12, including a 7-5, 6-1 SLC win over Antonio Cavazos of Incarnate Word... Named an SLC Player of the Week Honorable Mention Selection on April 15... Went 1-1 in doubles play, teaming with Parker Allen for a victory against John Brown.

PRIOR TO ORU

Lettered at White Hall High School, where he was coached by his father, Baylor... Was an Arkansas 5A State Champion as a sophomore and junior... Teamed with his brother to win the doubles state championship.

PERSONAL

Son of Baylor and Paula Guy... Plans to major in biomedical chemistry at ORU, with the goal of being a doctor after graduation... Father played collegiate tennis at Southern Arkansas University... Favorite professional athlete is Roger Federer... Enjoys playing table tennis is his spare time.
